attributes.action: Give fathers an equal chance to be awarded custody of children in event of divorce
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment, when a marriage breaks down, if the couple have children, the law states that, "Officially", the custody is chosen on the basis of each individual case. However, a disproportionate number of women are given sole custody, depriving thousands of loving fathers of seeing their children. The law should be enforced properly, so that the courts are not biased towards the mother in these cases.
